text: A&sya# vIqrO jA#yata UqrjA va#H paSyAM ~MyUqrjA mA# paSyaqtE-tyA#hAq &&SiSha#mEqvaitAmA SA$stEq tathsa#viqturvarE$NyaqmityA#haq prasU$tyai sOqmAnaq(gg)q svara#NaqmityA#ha sOmapIqthamEqvAva# rundhE kRuNuqhi bra#hmaNaspataq ityA#ha brahmavarcaqsamEqvAva# rundhEkaqdA caqna staqrIraqsItyA#haq na staqrI(gm) rAtri#M ~Mvasatiq - [  ] 34
